column5: Can anyone recommend a resort that will be open right after the ice goes out for lake trout this spring.Would prefer American plan,but will do own meals if resort isn't totally up and running due to early ice out. Fly in would work to. Thanks
Whitefish Bay Camp on LOW is very close to trout water, gets a lot of trout fishermen. Bill
Hey Bob,I just left you a message at your house, give me a call when you get a chance.Matt

try www.awonakina.com. .Remi has a camp on the north end of kag lake Opichuan camp, this agreat area of the lake in early spring . narrow outlet deep water.We caught lakers all over this lake in the spring.

aprowl,I would highly recommend Matt at Camp Manitou. Our group stayed there last year and he was a great host. Food incredible on the American Plan and I assume he will be open around ice out. The equipment at his resort was EXCELLENT and the cabins were nice. NP
Dog 2 i sent you a pm yesterday. Thanks
reply sent via email late last even.
